Goal Representation: ['1. Find the remote control for the TV.', '2. Turn on the TV using the remote control.']

def is_remote_control_device(remote:item):
    symbol is_remote_control = is_remote_control(remote)
    return is_remote_control

behavior look_for_remote_control(remote:item):
    body:
        achieve visited(remote)
        if is_remote_control_device(remote):
            achieve close_char(char, remote)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        foreach item: item:
            if grabbable(item) and not visited(item):
                look_for_remote_control(item)
['1. Find the remote control.', '2. Turn on the TV using the remote control.']

def has_remote_control(obj: item):
    symbol has_remote=exists rc: item : is_remote_control(rc) and close(rc, obj)
    return has_remote

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists obj: item : has_remote_control(obj):
            bind obj: item where:
                has_remote_control(obj)
            bind rc: item where:
                is_remote_control(rc) and close(rc, obj)
            achieve close_char(char, rc)
        else:
            foreach obj: item:
                if not visited(obj):
                    observe(obj, "Check if the item is a remote control or has a remote control near
 it")

behavior find_remote():

behavior __goal__():

        find_remote()
